name: Cutpurse's Confounding
entries: Beginning at 10th level, whenever you take damage from an attack or fail a saving throw you can use your reaction to either take half damage from the attack or reroll the saving throw. To do so you must expend 100gp, which vanishes in a puff of smoke. You canmake use of this feature until the total amount of gold pieces spent reaches 1000gp. This total resets when you finish a long rest.
